attr.name: disabled
attr.description: If this Boolean attribute is set, the form controls that are its descendants, except descendants of its first optional <legend> element, are disabled, i.e., not editable. They won't receive any browsing events, like mouse clicks or focus-related ones. Often browsers display such controls as gray.

attr.name: form
attr.description: This attribute has the value of the id attribute of the <form> element it's related to. Its default value is the id of the nearest <form> element it is a descendant of.

attr.name: name
attr.description:
The name associated with the group.
 Â 
 The label for the field set is given by the first <legend> element that is a child of this field set.

content: An optional <legend> element, followed by flow content.
omission: None, both the starting and ending tag are mandatory.
parents: Any element that accepts flow content.
